definitions.title: n.f.
definitions.body: : Ex 29:20 ear (Ar. 0’ud-n, Aram. 0edno0, [[אוּדְנׇא]], As. uznu, Eth. 0zn:)—abs. 2Sa 22:45 +; cstr. Ex 29:20 +; sf. [[אָזְנִי]] 1Sa 20:2 +, etc.; du. [[אָזְנַיִם]] ([[נׇ֑יִם]]) De 29:3 +; cstr. [[אָזְנֵי]] Ge 23:10 +; sf. [[אָזְנַי]] ([[־נׇ֑י]]) Nu 14:28 +; (never with article).—

ear, as part of body; of human being, as bearing earring Ge 35:4, Ex 32:2, Ex 32:3 (all JE) Ez Eze 16:12; pierced by a master Ex 21:6 (E) De 15:17; touched with blood in consecration (´[[תְּנוּךְ א]] tip of ear) Le 8:23, Le 8:24, Le 14:14, Le 14:17, Le 14:25, Le 14:28, cut off by enemy Ez Eze 23:25 (of [[אָהֳלִיבָה]] q.v.); ear of dog Pr 26:17 [[מַחֲזִיק בְּאָזְנֵי־כָָּלֶב]]; of sheep Am 3:12 (fragment rescued from lion).

definitions.title: a.
definitions.body: of man De 29:3, 2Sa 22:45 = Ps 18:45, Job 42:5, Is 30:21; implanted ([[נטע]]) by ´[[י]] Ps 94:9; of idols (do not hear) Ps 115:6, Ps 135:17; ´[[שָׁמַע בא]] 2Sa 7:22 + 8 t.; esp. ´[[בְּא]] after vb. of saying = in the ears, in the hearing of Ge 20:8 (E) Ge 23:10, Ge 23:13, Ge 23:16 (P) Ge 44:18, Ge 50:4 (J) De 5:1, De 31:11, De 31:28, De 31:30 + 44 t.; cf. Is 5:9 (vb. om.); after noun of utterance, sound 1Sa 15:14, Job 13:17, Job 15:21; cf. ´[[א]] after verbal noun Ez Eze 24:26 (´[[לְהַשְׁמָעוּת א]]) cf. Is 11:3; ´[[הִטָּה א]] incline the ear = give attention Ps 45:11, Pr 22:17 + 9 t.; sq. [[ל]] Ps 49:5 + 4 t.; so ´[[הִקְשִׁיב א]] Is 32:3; Pr 2:2 (sq. [[ל]]); ´[[ל]] ´[[הֵבִיא א]] Pr 23:2; as receiving words [[תָּקַּח]] ´[[א]] Job 4:12 cf. Je 9:19; as tingling ([[חלל]]) at dreadful news 1Sa 3:11, 2Ki 21:12, Je 19:3; as hearing with satisfaction, triumph Ps 92:12 [[תִּשְׁמַעְנׇה אָזְנׇי֑]] (‖ ´[[וַתַּבֵּט עֵינִי בְּ]] but Che del.; as intelligent (involving mental process) [[וַתָּבֶן לָהּ]] ´[[שָֽׁמְעָה א]] Job 13:1; [[מִלִּין תִּבְחָָן]] ´[[א]] Job 12:11 cf. Job 34:3; as unsatisfied Ec 1:8 [[מִשְּׁמׂעַ]] ´[[לאׁ תִמָּלֵא א]]; as seeking ([[בקשׁ]]) know-ledge Pr 18:15; as hearing & blessing Job 29:11; cf. [[שׁׂמַעַת]] ´[[א]] Pr 20:12, Pr 25:12 a hearing (responsive, obedient) ear; cf. Pr 15:31, Is 43:8; opp. stopping the ears (wilful ignorance) [[מִן־]] ´[[אׂטֵם א]] Pr 21:13 cf Is 33:15; also of adder in simile of wicked Ps 58:5 [[כְּמוֹ פֶתֶן חֵרֵשׁ יַאְטֵם אָזְנוֹ]]; [[מִן־]] ´[[מֵסִיר א]] Pr 28:9 so ´[[עֲרֵלָה א]] their ear is uncircumcised Je 6:10; ´[[הִכְּבִּיד א]] Zec 7:11 cf. Is 48:8, Je 5:21, Ez Eze 12:2; cf. also Is 42:20.
